DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate ability EXC 001 improve appearance scar subject undergoing elective abdominoplasty . The study also evaluate safety tolerability EXC 001 .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study EXC 001 Improve Appearance Scars Subjects Undergoing Elective Abdominoplasty
DOC.criteria: Subjects must sufficient excess abdominal tissue qualify standard elective abdominoplasty Subject choose elective abdominoplasty Medically healthy normal screen result Subjects must pregnant lactate Females currently pregnant pregnant 12 month prior inclusion study , lactate Participation another clinical trial within 30 day prior start study Any condition prior therapy , , opinion PI , would make subject unsuitable study
